sentences.en: Another advantage of Treasury Direct is that you can access your account on the Web to check account balances or reinvest a security when it matures.
sentences.cn: “国库券直达”的另一个优势就是你可以通过网络进入你的账户并查看账户余额，或者在一项投资到期时进行再投资。

sentences.en: But that is OK if you have already made that money are willing to reinvest it.
sentences.cn: 但是,这是确定如果您已经取得了这笔钱,并愿意投资它.

sentences.en: But the people in the industry only knew how to reinvest it [so they squandered a lot of capital].
sentences.cn: 然而那个产业中的人只知道再投资一个公司（所以很多钱都打了水漂）。

sentences.en: Don't. Instead, reinvest the profits. Buffett learned this early on.
sentences.cn: 但请不要这样做, 相反, 利润再投资,这便是巴菲特在他早期的投资方式.

sentences.en: Executives say they are hesitant to reinvest such profits into their businesses.
sentences.cn: 公司高管表示,他们对是否要将盈利再投资到业务中感到犹豫不决.

sentences.en: Or reinvest the money into the business.
sentences.cn: 又或是将这些钱重新投入公司.

sentences.en: Such organizations are required to be nonprofit and must reinvest their revenues back into the organization.
sentences.cn: 这个免税组织是非赢利性的,必须将其税收重新投资于该组织.

sentences.en: The central bank said interest rates would remain on hold at 0 to 0.25 per cent for an “extended period” and it would continue to reinvest in its securities portfolio.
sentences.cn: 美联储表示，利率将在“相当长一段时间”内继续维持在零到0.25%的水平，而且它将继续将投资所得再投资于它的证券组合。

sentences.en: They use the fund of gain at reinvest mostly, perhaps buy fixed assets.
sentences.cn: 他们把赚到的钱大多用于再投资, 或者购买固定资产.

sentences.en: You'd better seek advice from your father before you reinvest your money with the firm.
sentences.cn: 你向这个公司再投资之前最好先征询一下你父亲的意见。

trans.tran_en: to use money you have earned from  investment s  to buy additional investments
